entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
